body_html: I test on these systems once a month and the peering works fine. The messages is unfortunately misleading. I have a test that runs VGG16 with NCCL and it would not perform well if the sync was not GPU to GPU.
body_text: I test on these systems once a month and the peering works fine.  The messages is unfortunately misleading.  I have a test that runs VGG16 with NCCL and it would not perform well if the sync was not GPU to GPU.
